lead_paragraph: SPILLMAN--Harry J.,of New York City and Ocean Beach, Fire Island. Adored and Cherished Partner of Helen Cunneen, Loving father to Allison Spillman, Blair Burke (Robert) and Lee Spillman, Dear grandfather to Liam and Dylan Burke. A quintessential New York City working actor. He was a lover of Shakespeare and the classics, music, especially jazz, cooking and fine cuisine, gardening, fishing and photography. A modern day renaissance man. Visitation will be Tuesday from 11am to 1pm. Interment to follow Woodlawn Cemetery. Services are being handle by Frank E. Campbell "The Funeral Chapel". 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SPILLMAN, HARRY J.
